alert.note: Alert for Kiowa (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 22 at 2:46AM MDT until June 22 at 3:30AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Kiowa County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 330 AM MDT. * At 246 AM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Wild Horse Point to 11 miles northwest of Arlington, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Haswell, Arlington and Blue Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
